mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMPANY ( company_id, company_password, company_name, company_phone, company_email, drawn_company, company_create_at, business_number ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email}, 'N', SYSDATE, #{businessNumber} )
mapper.select: SELECT company_num AS companyNum, company_id AS companyId, business_number AS businessNumber, company_password AS companyPassword, company_name AS companyName, company_phone AS companyPhone, company_email AS companyEmail, drawn_company AS drawnCompany, company_create_at AS companyCreateAt FROM COMPANY WHERE company_email = #{email}
